sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

sections.header: Bucks Run- Due to the weather Bucks Run will be closed today, January 31, 2025.
sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will not be groomed today, January 31, 2025 due to warm temperatures. The trail was last groomed on January, 30, 2025.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Golf course trails, Hawk Hills and Coyote Run, were rolled on January 24, 2025.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.  All other trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks was in good shape from 12:30-1:30, given the warm up. Full coverage on the connector, two sets of tracks in the woods. Skate deck was getting soft when I finished up, but that's to be expected when it'd 44 degrees and full sun. Not sure what it will be like for the after-work crowd, but it should firm up real nice after the warm up. Two HUGE piles of snow should keep us skiing for a while.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and were packed yesterday morning. Expect firmer conditions following yesterday's thaw.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's slated to be a beautiful day at Nub's Nob. The temperature is expected to rise near 32 with increasing sun, especially in the afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
